content: this dragon scales baby blanket is an incredibly textured award-winning afghan made in a combination of regular crochet and tunisian crochet similar to crochet entrelac this baby afghan is made in a unique continuous mitered square repeat unlike tunisian crochet you typically find you will not need to use a long hook since each mitered square is a maximum of only 9 stitches a standard hook can be used >this pattern is available for free on my website here 1 if you prefer a pdf is also available for purchase 1 https //makeitcrochet com/dragon-scales-baby-blanket-free-crochet/
